title: [1.8.X/1.7.10][Grimoire Of Gaia 3——魔典盖亚3][蜗牛汉化]1.3.3更新!
author: Yveltal
txt_content:
本帖最后由 C似水流年 于 2016-9-21 18:12 编辑 





nMQL5qm.png (3.77 KB, 下载次数: 431)

下载附件

2015-12-19 14:22 上传





 1.3.2更新！（神奇的清明节更新） 感谢13112154673的更新告知!
[旧版本请移步 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-427225-1-7.html ]
作者的话[我就不翻译惹]

Introduction
    My intention with this mod was to make Minecraft remain a challenge and to give it a more unique experience. Because I lack the skill in programming enhanced AI or equipment, I intended for this mod to add mobs and make the game harder while more powerful and well coded mods provide high-end enhancements to the player. 
    This mod is not beginner friendly. It is best used by experienced players seeking a challenge or later in the game session.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
这里引用原搬运者的介绍[其实就是懒啦]：
盖亚魔典3wiki完整更新日志：http://the-grimoire-of-gaia.wikia.com/wiki/Changelog
MCmod百科站盖亚魔典3专题地址：http://www.mcmod.cn/class/399.htmlMCmod百科站盖亚魔典2专题地址：http://www.mcmod.cn/class/120.html盖亚魔典3wiki：http://the-grimoire-of-gaia.wikia.com/wiki/盖亚魔典3mod试玩（UP主：KTcent）：http://www.bilibili.com/video/av2171256/（稍简单粗略的大致介绍预览）推荐：生物模型模组：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=424130（魔物娘手办get）
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------主要更新内容
1.增加了几件武器
2.增加了几个新生物
3.替换了所有交易代币
4.现在没有卡片了!全都变成蛋了!
5.增加了几个新食物
6.听说增加了对神马时代的支持内容
7.更卡了[雾]
没什么人想看的更新日志

Grimoire of Gaia 3 (1.3.3) (Minor Update)Entities - General
Assist mobs no longer prevent the player from using the bed when close by
Except for the Ender Dragon GirlInadvertently fixed Assist mobs from automatically attacking non-vanilla Minecraft Villagers

Entities - Drops
Removed Blaze Rod, Ender Pearl and Nether Star Shards from droplistsReplaced Nether Star Shard with Copper Nugget and Ender Pearl Shard with Silver Nugget
They currently cannot be legitimately obtainedRemoved Blaze Rod Shard
Replaced Gold Bag with Ore Bag in Baphomet and Ender Dragon Girl rare dropsReplaced Iron Bag with Ore Bag in Succubus and Wither Cow rare dropsSatyr now drops Meat instead of LeatherJorogumo no longer drops Record BoxMimic now very rarely drops Record BoxAnubis no longer drops Mature Nether Wart
Mature Nether Wart now drops from Baphomet
Succubus and Wither Cow now drop Nether Quartz that is not affected by the Looting EnchantmentBaphomet no longer drops Nether Quartz
Entities - Miscellaneous
Replaced Selkie Fishing rod with Decorative Spear
Items
Modified textures
Iron and Gold NuggetIron, Gold and Diamond BagInert RingsWithered BrainStone CoalFireshardSell (Icon) and Tokens
Modified third person view of prop itemsAdded Golden Apple PieReplaced Golden Apple Slice with Golden Apple Pie Slice
When used in crafting, it now produces a Golden Apple Pie insteadReduced crafting recipe from 8 to 6
Adjusted Golden Apple Pie Slice buffs
Resistance (0:50)Fire Resistance (0:50)
Replaced Ceremonial Spear with Decorative SpearReplaced Jeweled dagger with Decorative Dagger
Grimoire of Gaia 3 (1.3.2) Modified Werecat model and textureReduced Mandrake Pie hunger to 4Reduce Meat Pie hunger to 6Fixed Mermaid Old Luggage Drop Rate
Grimoire of Gaia 3 (1.3.1) Removed unused particle code in AnubisReplaced the Leather Helmets of the Skeletons and Zombies spawned by the Anubis and Shaman with Pumpkins
Grimoire of Gaia 3 (1.3.0) (Minecraft 1.8.9 Update)Entities - General
Added Thaumcraft aspects to mobs
Summoned mobs (Butler and Sporeling) do not have aspects
Tied the knockback rates of mobs to their respective tiers
Entities
Added Matango and Weresheep
Added Sporeling
Removed Kobold
Entities - Design
Remodelled all female models
Streamlined code, models and texturesRemoved unnecessary code generated by TechneChanged directory for layer texture files to models/layerChanged directory for texture files of mobs using the biped model to models/biped
Modified Bone Knight, Ender Eye, Naga and Sharko modelsModified animations
Added blinking
Except for the Banshee, Vampire, Valkyrie and Witch
Added floating animations for the Banshee, Ender Eye, Mimic, Vampire, Valkyrie and WitchCobble and Cobblestone Golems now properly animatedArms now have idle animation similar to idle playerFixed issue with mobs facial features (hair, hats, ears, etc) separating when looking at a high or low anglesRemoved chest animation from Futachi Onna, Nine Tails, Succubus

Entities - Drops
Anubis, Shaman, Jorogumo and Witch drop (1-2) Ender Pearl Shards
Nether Star Shards can no be legitimately obtained
The rest is not listed until wikia is updated
Entities - Spawns
Reduced default spawn rate of Ender Dragon Girl
Ender Dragon Girl spawning has been limited to 1 per chunk
Butler and Mandragora can no longer be made to spawn naturally through 3rd party mods
Entities - Behavior
Mobs who can heal themselves have their recovered health scale with the health set through the config
Vampires regenerates 10% of their health when they hit the playerMandragora regenerates 20% of its health
Bone Knights, Mermaids and Nagas are now immune to arrows
They have a 25% chance of not being knocked back when hit
Anubis and Shaman spawns mobs (Skeletons and Zombies) with Leather Helmets
Items - General
Modified all item texturesReplaced Iron and Gold Shards with nuggets and Diamond and Emerald Shard with fragments
Removed Emerald FragmentRenamed oreDictionary entries from shard to nugget and removed the ingot suffix
Level based drops have been adjusted
Level 1 mobs drops 1 drop instead of 2
(1-3) Iron Nuggets
Level 2
(1-3) Gold Nuggets(1) Emerald Fragment
Level 3
(1) Golden Apple Slice(1-3) Diamond Fragments(1-3) Emerald Fragments
Nuggets and fragments are unaffected by the Looting enchantment
Added Baubles support to ringsAdded Thaumcraft aspects to blocks and items
Tokens and Prop Weapons do not have aspects
Added Very Rare category
Very Rare items have the same drop rate as rare items (2.5%) but are unaffected by the Looting EnchantmentCards and the Old Box are now in the "Very Rare" Category
Books are no longer 3D due to Forge issues
Items
Added Dark Sphere Prop Weapon
Replaces the texture of the projectile launched by the Anubis and Shaman
Added Weresheep Token
Replaced Coin with Trader TokenReplaced Coins of Gaia with SellRenamed Token to Holstaurus Token
Nuggets and fragments now use their OreDictionary entries when used in craftingSeparated item metadata of Iron, Gold, Diamond and Emerald Fragments/Nuggets and Ender Pearl, Blaze Rod and Nether Star ShardsRemoved Ender Pearl, Blaze Rod and Nether Star Shard OreDictionary entriesRemoved Berry PieRemoved Torn PageReplaced Berries
Replaced Health Berry with Rotten Heart
Hunger effect duration has been changed to 0:30Hunger effect has a 80% chance of occurringReduced stack limit to 1
Replaced Cure Berry with TaprootReplaced Ice Berry with IcefishRemoved Fire Berry
Replaced Dried Nether Ward with Mature Nether Wart
Mature Nether wart has a 40% chance of Speed or/and Haste when consumed
Replaced Meat Morsel with MeatReplaced Withered Meat with Withered Brain
Wither effect has a 60% chance of occurring
Replaced Meat Pie with Rotten Pie
Hunger effect has a 40% chance of occurring
Replaced Coal Brick with Stone CoalReplaced Deck of Cards with Egg BoxReplaced cards with eggs (not spawn eggs)Replaced Old Box with Old Luggage
Obtainable items have been changed
Renamed Book of Battle Techniques to Book of CombatMandrakes confusion now has a 80% chance of occurringMandrake Pie is no longer always edibleModified descriptions of a few items
Miscellaneous
Configurations can now be accessed through the Mod menu
Modified Flesh Lich model -改良了了血肉巫妖的模型Fixed Kobold spawning -修复了[地精]的生成It should now spawn during the day -地精能在白天生成惹
Increased default spawn rate -提高了正常生成几率[雾]
Increased default spawn rate of Witch -提高了巫女的正常生成几率
Fixed mobs from spawning in The Outer Lands (Thaumcraft) -修复了怪物在TC4境外之地(就是那个邪术世界)的生成
Mobs set to spawn in Roofed Forest biome is now more restricted -在黑森林生成的怪物更被限制惹
Updated Ender Dragon Girl and Ender Eye AI -提高了末影龙女和末影之眼的AI[我也没看出来提升了啥]Reduced Creep hit box-减小了爬行球的碰撞箱[本来就够小了好吧！]

蜗牛的汉化版： 1.7.10 版本1.2.7 百度网盘

还有最后tir1 max health 翻译成叠加1生命是什么鬼，
那是指等级1的怪,阿不，魔物娘的生命值

我建议改下名字的
Weresheep

Banshee

Satyr

Sahuagin

我只是想偷偷的问句。。什么时候能娶一只魔物娘妹子啊啊啊啊 ！！！好吧这个太难了。
什么时候能养一只啊？作者有没有继续添加魔物娘，以及养成收集魔物娘的计划和打算？
现在目测能碰到的友好型魔物娘只有6个
羊妹  末影妹  苦力怕MM  奶牛妹纸  商人【疑似兔娘？】 史莱姆咕嘿嘿妹子   
就这个6个 只能和她们做交易  真的只是普通的交易而已。。。。


完全   不够啊 啊啊啊！！！
下界的魅魔也很美啊啊啊！
九尾更可爱了啊！！！！【尾巴虽然做的有点简单。。】
根本忍不了了啊啊啊啊啊啊！
